text: ekajana rasula -- tini tomadera kache abrtti karachena allahâ€Œra nirdesabali, suspastabhabe, yena yara imana eneche o satkaja karache tadera tini bera kare anate parena andhakara theke aloke. Ara ye ke'u allahâ€Œte imana ane o satkaja kare, take tini prabesa karabena sbargo'udyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane se abasthana karabe cirakala. Allah tara jan'ya jibanopakaranake ati utkrsta kare'i rekhechena.
